fields.title: The Shawshank Redemption
fields.description: Two imprisoned men bond over several years.

fields.title: The Godfather
fields.description: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control to his son.

fields.title: Inception
fields.description: A thief who steals corporate secrets through dream-sharing technology is given a task to plant an idea.

fields.title: Pulp Fiction
fields.description: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, and a pair of bandits intertwine.

fields.title: The Dark Knight
fields.description: Batman faces the Joker, a criminal mastermind who brings chaos to Gotham.

fields.title: Forrest Gump
fields.description: The presidencies of Kennedy and Johnson, Vietnam, and more through the perspective of an Alabama man.

fields.title: The Matrix
fields.description: A computer hacker learns about the true nature of reality and his role in the war against its controllers.

fields.title: Fight Club
fields.description: An insomniac office worker forms an underground fight club as a form of male bonding.

fields.title: Interstellar
fields.description: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space to ensure humanity's survival.

fields.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King
fields.description: Gandalf and Aragorn lead the World of Men against Sauron's army.
